sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ShoppingBag, Heart, Settings, MapPin, Eye, Calendar, Package, Store, Plus, Award } from 'lucide-react'; const UserProfile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('orders'); // Mock user data - in real app this would come from API/auth context const userData = { id: 'user_123', firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', location: { city: 'New York', state: 'NY', country: 'USA' }, accountType: 'buyer', // 'buyer' or 'seller' canSell: false, // true after upgrade isSeller: false, // true if user has selling capabilities stats: { totalPurchases: 12, totalSpent: 850, favoriteItems: 23, reviewsGiven: 8, rating: 4.6, // as a buyer reviewCount: 5 }, joinedDate: '2023-06-15', membershipLevel: 'Silver', // Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum isVerified: true }; // Tab configuration - same tabs but different content for sellers const tabConfig = [ { id: 'orders', label: userData.isSeller ? 'Sales History' : 'Order History', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'pending', label: userData.isSeller ? 'Active Listings' : 'Pending Orders', icon: Package }, { id: 'wishlist', label: userData.isSeller ? 'My Products' : 'Wishlist', icon: Heart }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ]; const handleUpgradeToSeller = () => { // In real app, this would make API call to upgrade account // For now, redirect to simple seller dashboard window.location.href = '/sell/dashboard'; }; // For testing - toggle between buyer and seller views const handleToggleSellerMode = () => { // In real app, this would come from API/auth context // For demo purposes, we'll toggle the seller state userData.isSeller = !userData.isSeller; userData.canSell = userData.isSeller; window.location.reload(); // Simple refresh for demo }; return (
{/* Header */}

My Profile

{userData.location.city}, {userData.location.state} {userData.membershipLevel} Member Joined {new Date(userData.joinedDate).toLocaleDateString()} {userData.isVerified && ( ✓ Verified )}
{/* Test Toggle Button - for demo purposes */} {!userData.canSell && !userData.isSeller && ( )}
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{tabConfig.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Content */}
{activeTab === 'orders' && ( userData.isSeller ? ( ) : ( ) )} {activeTab === 'pending' && ( userData.isSeller ? ( ) : ( ) )} {activeTab === 'wishlist' && ( userData.isSeller ? ( ) : ( ) )} {activeTab === 'settings' && ( )}
); }; // Order History Tab const OrderHistoryTab = ({ userId }) => { const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); return (
{/* Filters */}
{/* Orders List */}
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(i => (

Order #{12340 + i}

Placed on Dec {i}, 2023

{i <= 2 ? 'Delivered' : i === 3 ? 'Shipping' : 'Pending'}

Product Name {i}

Quantity: 1

$99.99

{i <= 2 && ( )}
))}
); }; // Sales History Tab (for sellers) const SalesHistoryTab = ({ userId }) => { const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); return (

Sales History

{[1, 2, 3, 4].map(i => (

Sale #{12300 + i}

Sold on Dec {i + 10}, 2023

{i <= 2 ? 'Completed' : 'Shipped'}

My Product {i}

Buyer: Customer {i}

+$89.99

))}
{/* Earnings Summary */}

); }; // Active Listings Tab (for sellers) const ActiveListingsTab = ({ userId }) => (

Active Listings

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6].map(i => (

My Product {i}

$99.99

Listed 2 days ago {12 + i * 3} views
{i <= 4 ? 'Active' : 'Pending'}
))}
); // My Products Tab (for sellers) const MyProductsTab = ({ userId }) => (

My Products

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(i => (

{i <= 3 ? 'Active' : 'Sold'}
))}

); // Pending Orders Tab const PendingOrdersTab = ({ userId }) => (

Order #{12340 + i}

Placed on Dec {i + 5}, 2023

Quantity: 1

$129.99

))}
); // Wishlist Tab const WishlistTab = ({ userId }) => (

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8].map(i => (

Wishlist Item {i}

$159.99

))}
); // Settings Tab (same as before) const SettingsTab = ({ userData }) => (

); export default UserProfile;
